attributes.action: St Georges day a public holiday
attributes.additional_details:
We want to have a day off work, so we can celebrate our national day. 

We want to be able to have days out with family and friends, fly the flag of the  England and have a day to celebrate our great country.
attributes.background: English people deserve to celebrate their national day. Australia have public holiday for Australia day, Ireland have St Patrick day.As English people we work hard and are very patriotic, so we should be able to celebrate our National day like many other countries.
